hadith.chapter: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer - كتاب الْمَسَاجِدِ وَمَوَاضِعِ الصَّلاَةِ
hadith.arabic-text: قال مسلم ورواه الأشجعي عن سفيان الثوري، عن الأسود بن قيس، عن شقيق بن عقبة، عن البراء بن عازب، قال قرأناها مع النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم زمانا ‏.‏ بمثل حديث فضيل بن مرزوق ‏.‏
hadith.english-text: Imam Muslim said: Ashja'i narrated it from Sufyan al-Thauri, who narrated it from al-Aswad b. Qais, who narrated it from 'Uqba, who narrated it from al-Bara' b. 'Azib who said: We recited with the Prophet (may peace be upon him) (the above-mentioned verse like this, i. e. instead of Salat al- Wusta, Salat al-'Asr) for a certain period. as It has been mentioned (in the above-quoted hadith).
